name: ApplySemanticVersioningToSdkProjects
friendlyName: Apply Semantic Versioning to Sdk Projects
description: Sets Version attribute in *.vbproj and *.csproj files in a manner which is compatible with NuGet and Semantic Versioning 2.0.0.
author: Filippo Bottega

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.label: Build Number Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pattern to extract the four version numbers from the build number. This must match exactly four entries separated by the split characters.

inputs.name: patternSplitCharacters
inputs.label: Split Characters
inputs.helpMarkDown: The characters to split up the matched string from the build number. Simply just list all required characters. No comma separation needed.

instanceNameFormat: Apply Semantic Versioning to Sdk Projects
